Key Responsibilities
Social Media Management (Primary Focus)
Content Creation: Design engaging social media graphics, posts, and visual content
Content Deployment: Schedule and publish content across multiple platforms (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, Twitter, etc.)
Community Management: Monitor and respond to comments, messages, and engage with followers
Analytics & Reporting: Track performance metrics and provide monthly reports on engagement, reach, and growth
Strategy Development: Collaborate on social media strategies aligned with organizational goals
Brand Consistency: Ensure all content maintains consistent brand voice and visual identity

SharePoint Development (Secondary/Project-based)
Site Design: Create and customize SharePoint pages with professional, user-friendly layouts
Information Architecture: Organize content and navigation for optimal user experience
Collaboration Setup: Configure document libraries, lists, and workflows

Required Skills & Experience
3+ years of social media management experience
Proficiency in design software (Canva, Adobe Creative Suite, or similar)

Strong English communication skills (written and verbal)
Analytics Experience with social media insights and reporting

SharePoint experience (Office 365/SharePoint Online)
Basic web design knowledge (HTML/CSS)
Non-profit sector experience
Graphic design background or certification
Project management experience

Reliable internet connection
Computer with updated software
